column4: I just installed Xubuntu 8.10 on my PS3 but I can't seem to get wireless to work... it's not showing my wireless network in the networks list, and when I put in the ESSID and key manually it fails to connect
I am using WEP by the way
Do other networks showup?
nope
none do
and usually I can see a few other networks from my house
when I do ifconfig wlan0 does show up too
what do you get from typing 'ifconfig' in the terminal?
preempted :)
:) ifconfig wlan0 does or does not show up? :)
Just making sure.
it DOES show up
Interesting...
yeah, I know, it's weird...
I had the same problems in the installer, it wouldn't connect
just for fun, cna you burn regular ubuntu 8.10 and load it up as a livecd to see if the drivers work?
can you give me a link for it?  Not sure which one to burn
www.ubuntu.com
yeah, but, don't I Need like... a powerpc one?
Not sure. I don't know PS3 honestly.
oh
download the Alternative PowerPC + PS3 iso
http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/ports/releases/8.10/release/ubuntu-8.10-alternate-powerpc+ps3.iso
